tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LegalData (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255),
    lawyer_name VARCHAR(255),
    case_description TEXT,
    court_name VARCHAR(255),
    case_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE CourtDecisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_date DATE,
    decision_text TEXT,
    case_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES LegalCases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CaseHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    action_description TEXT,
    action_date DATE,
    lawyer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES LegalCases(case_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (lawyer_id) REFERENCES Lawyers(lawyer_id)
);
